tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE air_quality_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
  pollutant_type VARCHAR(50),
  pollution_level FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AirQualityData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  pollution_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalInitiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  pollutant_type VARCHAR(50),
  pollution_level DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_devices (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(100),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  installation_date DATE,
  city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE pollution_sources (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(100),
  source_type VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  emission_rate DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AirQualityData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(255),
    pollutant_type VARCHAR(50),
    pollutant_level DECIMAL,
    measurement_datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PollutionAlerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(255),
    pollutant_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_level VARCHAR(50),
    alert_datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalInitiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
